pages.index: Welcome to LittleRollers - Your Ultimate Destination for Stylish and Safe Baby Strollers LittleRollers Home Comfort and convenience Accessories They talk about us Statistics Strollers Welcome to LittleRollers! Welcome to LittleRollers, your one-stop shop for all things baby strollers! We offer a wide selection of high-quality, stylish, and safe strollers to make every stroll with your little one a breeze. Explore our collection and find the perfect ride for your precious bundle of joy. Let's roll with LittleRollers! Start inspection Comfort and convenience Discover Our Top Picks Lightweight and Stylish Experience the perfect blend of functionality and fashion with our lightweight strollers. Easy to maneuver, these strollers are ideal for busy parents on the go. All-Terrain Adventure Take on any terrain with our rugged all-terrain strollers. Designed for outdoor enthusiasts, these strollers ensure a smooth ride for your little explorer. Compact and Convenient For urban dwellers or travelers, our compact strollers offer convenience without compromising on comfort. Foldable and easy to store, they are perfect for city life. Luxury Comfort Indulge your little one with our luxury strollers. Packed with features for ultimate comfort, these strollers are a treat for both parent and child. Stroller Accessories Enhance Your Strolling Experience Explore our range of stroller accessories to customize and enhance your strolling experience. From cozy footmuffs to convenient cup holders, we have everything you need to make every outing with your little one comfortable and stylish. Make your LittleRollers stroller truly yours with our selection of accessories designed to add functionality and flair to your daily adventures. Look What are they saying about us Customer Reviews Exceptional Quality Our customers rave about the exceptional quality of our strollers. Built to last and designed with safety in mind, LittleRollers strollers exceed expectations. Not only are our strollers stylish, but they are also incredibly practical. From adjustable handles to easy folding mechanisms, our customers love the convenience our strollers offer. Stylish and Practical Durable construction Smooth maneuverability Comfortable for baby Stylish design Easy to clean Convenient storage options Excellent customer service Fast shipping and delivery 1000 Happy Customers 400 Stroller Models 5000 Strolls Taken 500 Five-Star Reviews Explore Our Top Picks Comfortable and Stylish Stroller for Everyday Use ₹5000 Everyday Comfort Order now All-Terrain Stroller for Outdoor Adventures ₹8000 Outdoor Adventure Companion Order now Luxury Stroller with Premium Features ₹12000 Luxury Comfort Order now Subscribe for Exclusive Offers Stay Updated with LittleRollers I accept the Privacy Policy Send Get in Touch with LittleRollers Contact Us for Any Inquiries 3-5, 815/A, Old MLA Quarters Rd, Avanti Nagar, Himayatnagar, Hyderabad, Telangana 500029, India +91-402-3237605 littlerollers@gmail.com Additional Services Explore Our Extra Offerings Gift Wrapping Services Make your gift extra special with our premium gift wrapping services. Whether it's a baby shower present or a birthday gift, we'll ensure it's beautifully wrapped and ready to delight. Join our stroller maintenance workshops to learn how to keep your stroller in top condition. Our experts will guide you through essential maintenance tips and tricks to ensure your stroller stays in perfect shape for years to come. pages.privacy-policy: LittleRollers Privacy Policy - Your Guide to Our Commitment to Data Protection LittleRollers Home Comfort and convenience Accessories They talk about us Statistics Strollers Privacy Policy Professional Advice The information provided on LittleRollers is not intended to constitute professional advice of any kind. It is provided for general informational purposes only and should not be relied upon as a substitute for professional advice tailored to your specific circumstances. Before making any decisions or taking any actions based on the information provided on this website, you should seek professional advice relevant to your situation. Accuracy of Information We strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information on LittleRollers. However, we cannot guarantee that all information provided is entirely accurate, complete, or current at all times. We aim to update the content regularly, but there may be instances where information becomes outdated or errors occur. Therefore, any reliance you place on the information provided on this website is strictly at your own risk. Third-Party Content LittleRollers may feature content provided by third parties, such as guest bloggers, advertisers, or sponsors. The views expressed in such content are those of the authors and do not necessarily reflect the views of LittleRollers. We do not endorse or guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any third-party content. Any reliance you place on such content is strictly at your own risk. Affiliate Links LittleRollers may contain affiliate links, which means that we may earn a commission if you make a purchase through those links. However, this does not affect the price you pay or influence our editorial content. We only recommend products or services that we genuinely believe will be of value to our users. Your use of affiliate links is entirely voluntary, and any purchases made through them are at your own discretion. Indemnification You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless LittleRollers, its affiliates, and their respective officers, directors, employees, agents, licensors, and suppliers from and against all losses, expenses, damages, and costs, including reasonable attorneys' fees, resulting from any violation of this disclaimer or any activity related to your use of the website (including negligent or wrongful conduct) by you or any other person accessing the website using your internet account. User Conduct When using LittleRollers, you agree to abide by all applicable laws and regulations, as well as these terms of use and any additional guidelines or rules provided by LittleRollers. You agree not to engage in any conduct that could harm, disable, overburden, or impair the proper functioning of the website, including but not limited to: Interfering with or disrupting the security of the website or any servers or networks connected to the website. Attempting to gain unauthorized access to any portion of the website, other accounts, computer systems, or networks connected to the website, through hacking, password mining, or any other means. Transmitting or distributing any viruses, worms, defects, Trojan horses, or other malicious code. Collecting or harvesting any information about other users, including email addresses, without their consent. Termination of Access LittleRollers reserves the right to terminate or suspend access to the website, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach these terms of use. Upon termination, your right to use the website will immediately cease. If you wish to terminate your account, you may simply discontinue using the website. Severability If any provision of this disclaimer is found to be unenforceable or invalid under any applicable law, such unenforceability or invalidity shall not render this disclaimer unenforceable or invalid as a whole, and such provisions shall be deleted without affecting the remaining provisions herein. Entire Agreement This disclaimer constitutes the entire agreement between you and LittleRollers regarding your use of the website, superseding any prior agreements between you and LittleRollers relating to your use of the website. User Responsibilities While using LittleRollers, you agree to: Abide by all applicable laws and regulations. Refrain from using the website for any unlawful or prohibited purpose. Respect the intellectual property rights of LittleRollers and third parties. Provide accurate and truthful information when interacting with the website. User Conduct When using LittleRollers, you agree not to: Engage in any activity that could harm, disrupt, or interfere with the operation of the website. Transmit any viruses, malware, or other malicious code. Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the website or any other systems or networks connected to the website. Use automated means, such as bots or scrapers, to access or interact with the website. Impersonate any person or entity or falsely state or misrepresent your affiliation with any person or entity. Collect or store personal data about other users without their consent. Termination of Access LittleRollers reserves the right to suspend or terminate your access to the website at any time without prior notice or liability for any reason, including if you violate this disclaimer or engage in any conduct that LittleRollers, in its sole discretion, considers to be inappropriate, harmful, or objectionable. Severability If any provision of this disclaimer is found to be unenforceable or invalid under any applicable law, such unenforceability or invalidity shall not render this disclaimer unenforceable or invalid as a whole. Any such provisions shall be severed from this disclaimer, and the remaining provisions shall continue in full force and effect. Entire Agreement This disclaimer constitutes the entire agreement between you and LittleRollers regarding your use of the website, superseding any prior agreements between you and LittleRollers relating to your use of the website. Updates and Revisions LittleRollers reserves the right to update, revise, or change this disclaimer at any time without prior notice. Any changes to this disclaimer will be posted on this page, and it is your responsibility to review this page periodically to stay informed about any updates. Your continued use of the website after any changes to this disclaimer will constitute your acceptance of such changes. Waiver The failure of LittleRollers to enforce any provision of this disclaimer shall not be deemed a waiver of such provision or any other provision herein. The waiver of any provision of this disclaimer shall not be construed as a waiver of any other provision or of the right to enforce such provision. No Warranties LittleRollers is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, regarding the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability, or availability of the information, products, services, or related graphics contained on the website for any purpose. Any reliance you place on such information is strictly at your own risk. Limitation of Liability In no event shall LittleRollers or its affiliates be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in any way connected with the use of our website, including but not limited to damages for loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages. Third-Party Links LittleRollers may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by us. We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites or services. You acknowledge and agree that LittleRollers shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with the use of or reliance on any such content, goods, or services available on or through any such websites or services. Indemnification You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless LittleRollers and its affiliates from and against any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, and expenses, including without limitation, reasonable attorney's fees and costs, arising out of or in any way connected with your access to or use of our website or violation of this disclaimer. Thank you for your attention to these important matters. pages.terms-conditions: LittleRollers Terms of Use - Understand Our Guidelines for Using Our Services LittleRollers Home Comfort and convenience Accessories They talk about us Statistics Strollers Terms of Use Modifications to the Terms LittleRollers reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion. By continuing to access or use the Site after any revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms. If you do not agree to the new terms, you are no longer authorized to use the Site. Entire Agreement These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and LittleRollers regarding the use of the Site, superseding any prior agreements between you and LittleRollers relating to your use of the Site. Waiver and Severability The failure of LittleRollers to enforce any right or provision of these Terms will not be deemed a waiver of such right or provision. If any provision of these Terms is held by a court of competent jurisdiction to be invalid, illegal, or unenforceable for any reason, such provision shall be eliminated or limited to the minimum extent such that the remaining provisions of the Terms will continue in full force and effect. Assignment LittleRollers may assign its rights and duties under these Terms to any party at any time without notice to you. You may not assign or transfer your rights or obligations under these Terms without the prior written consent of LittleRollers. Headings The section headings in these Terms are for convenience only and have no legal or contractual effect. Indemnification You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless LittleRollers, its affiliates, licensors, and service providers, and its and their respective officers, directors, employees, contractors, agents, licensors, suppliers, successors, and assigns from and against any claims, liabilities, damages, judgments, awards, losses, costs, expenses, or fees (including reasonable attorneys' fees) arising out of or relating to your violation of these Terms or your use of the Site, including, but not limited to, any use of the Site's content, services, and products other than as expressly authorized in these Terms or your use of any information obtained from the Site. Prohibited Uses You may use the Site only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to use the Site: In any way that violates any applicable federal, state, local, or international law or regulation. To engage in any conduct that restricts or inhibits anyone's use or enjoyment of the Site, or which, as determined by us, may harm LittleRollers or users of the Site, or expose them to liability. To send, knowingly receive, upload, download, use, or re-use any material that does not comply with the content standards set out in these Terms. To transmit, or procure the sending of, any advertising or promotional material without our prior written consent, including any "junk mail", "chain letter," or "spam" or any other similar solicitation. To impersonate or attempt to impersonate LittleRollers, a LittleRollers employee, another user, or any other person or entity. Third-Party Links The Site may contain links to third-party websites or resources. These links are provided for your convenience only. LittleRollers has no control over the content of these websites or resources and accepts no responsibility for them or for any loss or damage that may arise from your use of them. If you decide to access any third-party websites or resources linked to this Site, you do so entirely at your own risk and subject to the terms and conditions of use for such websites or resources. Feedback and Suggestions LittleRollers welcomes feedback, comments, suggestions, and ideas from its users. Any feedback, comments, suggestions, or ideas you provide to LittleRollers regarding the Site or any products or services offered through the Site shall be deemed non-confidential and non-proprietary. LittleRollers shall be free to use such feedback, comments, suggestions, or ideas without any obligation to you, including without limitation, to develop, manufacture, market, or improve its products or services. Termination LittleRollers reserves the right to terminate or suspend your access to all or any part of the Site at any time, with or without cause, with or without notice, effective immediately. Upon termination of your access to the Site, your right to use the Site will immediately cease. All provisions of these Terms which by their nature should survive termination shall survive termination, including, without limitation, ownership provisions, warranty disclaimers, indemnity, and limitations of liability. Notice LittleRollers may provide you with notices, including those regarding changes to these Terms, by email, regular mail, or postings on the Site. Electronic Communications By using the Site, you consent to receive electronic communications from LittleRollers (via email or by posting notices on the Site), and you agree that all agreements, notices, disclosures, and other communications that LittleRollers provides to you electronically satisfy any legal requirement that such communications be in writing. Accessibility LittleRollers is committed to making its Site accessible to all users. If you experience any difficulty accessing or using the Site, please contact us at littlerollers@gmail.com for assistance. Force Majeure LittleRollers shall not be liable for any failure or delay in performance resulting from acts beyond its reasonable control, including, but not limited to, acts of God, natural disasters, war, terrorism, labor disputes, strikes, or shortages of materials. Dispute Resolution Any dispute relating in any way to your visit to the Site or to products or services sold or distributed by LittleRollers shall be submitted to confidential arbitration in California, except that, to the extent you have in any manner violated or threatened to violate LittleRollers' intellectual property rights, LittleRollers may seek injunctive or other appropriate relief in any state or federal court in the State of California, and you consent to exclusive jurisdiction and venue in such courts. Arbitration under these Terms shall be conducted pursuant to the Commercial Arbitration Rules then prevailing at the American Arbitration Association. The arbitrator's award shall be final and binding and may be entered as a judgment in any court of competent jurisdiction. To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, no arbitration under these Terms shall be joined to an arbitration involving any other party subject to these Terms, whether through class arbitration proceedings or otherwise. Amendments LittleRollers reserves the right to amend these Terms at any time. Any amendments will be effective immediately upon posting on the Site. Your continued use of the Site after the posting of any amended Terms shall constitute your agreement to be bound by any such changes. It is your responsibility to review these Terms periodically for updates and changes. Entire Agreement These Terms, together with any additional terms and conditions or policies referenced herein or made available to you by LittleRollers, constitute the entire agreement between you and LittleRollers relating to the subject matter herein and supersede all prior or contemporaneous communications and proposals, whether oral or written, between you and LittleRollers with respect to such subject matter. No Waiver The failure of LittleRollers to exercise or enforce any right or provision of these Terms shall not constitute a waiver of such right or provision. Interpretation The headings used in these Terms are included for convenience only and will not limit or otherwise affect these Terms. pages.thanks: Thank You from LittleRollers - Appreciating Your Support and Trust in Our Products Thank You for Reaching Out! Dear LittleRollers User, We want to extend our heartfelt gratitude for taking the time to connect with us. Your feedback is incredibly valuable to us as we strive to enhance your experience with LittleRollers. Rest assured, your message has been received, and our team will diligently review it. We are committed to addressing your inquiries, suggestions, or concerns promptly and effectively. Thank you once again for choosing LittleRollers. We look forward to continuing to serve you and providing you with the best possible experience. Sincerely, The LittleRollers Team To main
